37Director 
Compensation      
The Nominating/Corporate Governance Committee is 
responsible for reviewing and awarding compensation 
to the non-employee Directors and works with Meridian 
Compensation Partners, LLC, an independent compensation 
consultant, to fulfill that responsibility. Compensation is 
based on experience, review of the compensation paid to 
directors of comparable publicly-traded companies and 
Meridian’s advice. ArcBest also offers a combination of 
cash and stock-based compensation to attract and retain 
qualified candidates to serve on the Board. Learn more 
about ArcBest Board of Directors' compensation.
